text: Hi! I'm having a problem with the email template I'm using via Drag and Drop Beta, and I'm asked to adjust the spacing from a pre-existing padding/spaces, is there a way for me to override them?
<#CES6JU0RY|drag-drop-email-beta>  is the best place to go for anything related to the DnD beta. I think unfortunately for your case there may not be a way to adjust that spacing right now
